pageContext.claim: “They like wind. Wind. I won't repeat it, but last year, the best line of the whole thing was wind, right? 'Darling, I'd like to watch television.' 'I'm sorry, Alice, the wind is not blowing. You can't watch the debate.' That was the best line.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often imagines that if there is no wind, then homes lose electricity. That's ridiculous. Wind turbines do not generate power when there's no wind, but the power grid can handle this variability.
